description: The Ruby Ridge Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Ruby Ridge') is an amazing plant species renowned for its exceptional foliage beauty. Its vibrant foliage spreads out in a shapely, broad and upright form. Averaging 8–10 feet tall and 9–11 feet wide, its crimson-red leaves are deeply divided, adding a unique texture and visual interest, perfect for any outdoor space. Through the summer the leaves deepen to a rich burgundy and then turn vibrant orange to fiery red shades in the fall. Not to mention, Ruby Ridge Japanese Maples are highly adaptable and easy to care for, making them a great choice for novice gardeners.
